text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria tahitensis is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to French Polynesia.
text.Sources: Florence, J. (1998). "Psychotria tahitensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38975A10155006. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38975A10155006.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
